Texts.Eng: I've no idea how to reach my friend. ^orange;All of the teleporters^reset; leading to Delta Freya II appear to be down, and I can't get word to them. If you find a way there, could you please search for my pal Wagner?
Oh no. Wagner is...dead? Thank you...^orange;Sad news is better than no news at all^reset;. Please take this for your efforts, and leave me. ^green;I need to be alone^reset;  for a while.

Texts.Chs: 取回^orange;瓦格纳的ID卡^reset;并交给我。(在^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Return ^orange;Wagner's ID^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
